a.h2: Educators from Taiwan visit LMS to learn about Project Based Learning

div.h2: RSU 23 Blueberry Crisp recipe featured at the Maine Commissioner of Agriculture’s luncheon

a.h2: Check out our Food & Nutrition Services on Facebook!

div.p: All students in Old Orchard Beach will have equitable access to high-quality teaching and rigorous learning opportunities in a safe and nurturing setting on the beautiful coastline of Southern Maine.

The School district, through a partnership with our parents, students, educators, and community members, will ensure that all students are prepared for success in college, in their careers, and as responsible citizens in a global society.

img.p: Old Orchard Beach schools offer opportunities for students to explore their interests in sports and the arts.
In Old Orchard Beach we feel that our students can do anything. Find out what we can offer you!
From ample learning opportunities to extensive extracurriculars! Find out all the possibilities at RSU 23!
